rooms.name: Entrance
rooms.description:
You stand at the entrance of a narrow cave. 
There is a faint light inside the cave, towards north.
To the east is a dingy forest where you will most certainly perish.

rooms.name: Cave opening
rooms.description:
You stand in what seems to be an old mine. Somehow, the torch on the wall is still lit.
A rusty pickaxe lies on the ground.
You can see daylight towards south.
A long tunnel stretches west.

rooms.name: Forest edge
rooms.description:
The trees loom over you. Something rustles in the undergrowth.
A glint of metal catches your eye.
The cave entrance lies to the west.

rooms.name: Rail tunnel
rooms.description:
You reach a rail line. A human skeleton lies upon the track, it seems to have been there for years. The mining helmet on his skull is unscathed.
Towards the south, you can see a light at the end of the tunnel. You can hear the sound of a pickaxe hitting rock.
To the north, the tunnel stretches on.

rooms.name: Mine entrance
rooms.description:
You stand at the entrance of a mine. The sound of a pickaxe hitting rock is louder here.
A goblin stands in front of you, blocking the way.
To the south the rail line continues.

rooms.name: Collapsed tunnel
rooms.description:
The tunnel has collapsed. You can see daylight through the rubble.
To the south, you can see the rail tunnel.

items.name: Pickaxe
items.description: A rusty pickaxe. It looks like it has seen better days.

items.name: Helmet
items.description: A mining helmet. It looks like it has seen better days.

items.name: Human Skull
items.description: A human skull. Why would you pick that up? It's disgusting.

items.name: White BroncoNator 2000
items.description: White BroncoNator 2000. Legend says only those upon whom the gloves fit may wield this mighty sword. It whispers its murderous intent to you.

enemies.name: Goblin Miner
enemies.description: A small, green creature with a wicked grin. It wields a rusty knife.
